mapper.sql: id, addTime, fid, uid, modified, allow
mapper.select: select from myfriends where uid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and allow=1
SELECT FROM myfriends where uid=#{uid} and fid=#{fid} and allow=1 limit 1

select
from myfriends where uid=#{uid} and fid=#{fid} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into myfriends
id,

fid,
uid,

mapper.update:
update myfriends
addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
allow = #{allow,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update myfriends set addTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, allow = #{allow,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
